Seasons Of Code

Joint Modelling of Source Code and Natural Language    • Kalpesh Krishna   

WnCC - Seasons of Code

Seasons of Code is a programme launched by WnCC along the lines of the Google Summer of Code. It provides one with an opprtunity to learn and participate in a variety of interesting projects under the mentorship of the very best in our institute.

  • Learn More

Joint Modelling of Source Code and Natural Language

• Kalpesh Krishna   
• Development & Machine Learning

Mentees:
• Arjit Jain
• Sanit Gupta

Contact the Mentor:
• Messenger - Kalpesh Krishna
• Email ID - kalpeshk2011@gmail.com

Stipend:
INR 3000

The task is to convert English to code and convert code back into English

A number of use cases can be possible here, automatic generation of test code, comments, docstrings, or maybe more efficient ways to write code / code review.

My goal is to somehow use signals from a compiler (as reinforcement learning rewards / or loss function terms) to assist this modelling.

Here are some recent papers trying to model this.

Paper Number Site
1. Association for Computational Linguistics
2. University of Washington
3. Github

Most of the papers here are 2016/17, so I think this is in a fairly nascent stage at the moment.

The Web and Coding Club

We are the coding community of IIT Bombay. WnCC is one of the biggest clubs of IIT Bombay. We believe that every individual should know how to code. Under the aegis of ITC (former STAB), we carry forward our vision of propagating the enthusiasm for coding in our institute.
